name: BOAT-COOP
description:
Game concept rafting

Quick overview

-Player has rafting boat

-Goal is collect the coins to activate the portal

-Think river to start

-Player has oars

-Players need to collect the coins to pass to other level

-As levels progress there are barriers,borders that are shown on the game

to block the boat Woods Border`s of the river Stones Waves

The aim is collect the coins to open the portal to jump to other level

Playfield does not show the portal until players have enough coin

Playfield puts up barriers on the water

Players must use their oars

Players gain score and boost when they collected the coins

The size of coins doesnt important but they have to find every coin

There is current in the river, so players cannot move fast

Each player collect coins but there is one scoreboard,so they cooperate

each other,for example there are 3 coins in the game, when I collected a

coin there are 2 coins in the game, so it does not important which player

collected it.

The playfield, scoreboard and toolbox

Playfield- The are that play occurs. This includes the river, woods,

stones,waves

Scoreboard- It shows how many coins players have to collect more

Toolbox-Players can buy oars and boat at the store

Playfield powerups

Some areas has slower current, so players can move faster and players gain boost with coins

Themes

Traditional Commodity-Money system

Players collect coins to open the portals but if players collected coins

over than what the portal wants,they can use them at the store

Players can spend real money to purchase coin and items

Playfield construction set

Player can spend the coins to jump other levels

Playfields are shared with coop player

Sound effects

Natural water voices

Other details

Players can customize their toolset, they can choose the boat and oars

and theirs` color. It creates a different looking for each player.

Last level is in the space,which is harder than other levels
